description:
Kartoon Racing: Singleplayer Multiplayer Racing
is Multiplayer and Singleplayer Racing Game,

Race with these sweet graphics and competition with cars!
Against AI or Real players if you want!
Race comfortably in large carefully designed maps,
Earn money from each race and buy new vehicles!

Select Drift Mode or Racing Mode!

Remember, an expensive car is always faster, so how do you get to this fast car?
By winning races!

You can compete against Intelligently Designed Artificial Intelligence
or Why not compete with your friends?
Compete with your Friends or Others with the Multiplayer mode,
Create room and wait for your opponents!
name: Kartoon Racing: Singleplayer Multiplayer Racing
